Package ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.model.gamelogic

Class GameStateController

java.lang.Object
ch.zhaw.theluckyseven.frantic.model.gamelogic.GameStateController
public class GameStateController
extends java.lang.Object
Class that controls the GameState and triggers events of cards

  • Constructor Details

    • GameStateController

      public GameStateController​(Config.GameDuration gameDuration, java.util.List<java.lang.String> players) throws GameException
      Parameters:
      gameDuration - defines how long the game should take
      players - list containing player names. NOTE: The order of the names in the list,
      Throws:
      GameException - if the game is stopped unexpectedly (ex. user disconnected)

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()

    • currentPlayerCanFinishTurn

      public boolean currentPlayerCanFinishTurn()
      Returns:
      true, when either card was placed, or card was drawn.

    • dealHandCardToActivePlayer

      public void dealHandCardToActivePlayer()
      Deals handCards to the current player

    • dealHandCard

      public void dealHandCard​(int playerId)
      Note: May also be used in case if some other than current player hast to draw a card. Note: if player is the player in turn, the function will also set 'turnUnfinished' flag to false.
      Parameters:
      playerId - id of the player who has to take a card

    • executeCardPlacement

      public void executeCardPlacement​(HandCard playedCard)
      Remove given card from the player hand. Update card on top. Execute action if the given card is special or an numeral card(black). Update flag.

      Note: card musst be 'playable' in order to be accepted

      Parameters:
      playedCard - card to be played

    • openEventCard

      public void openEventCard()
      Method to invoke an event card

    • playLastOpenedEventCard

      public void playLastOpenedEventCard()
      Execute the Event

    • isGameEnded

      public boolean isGameEnded()
      Method to check if game is ended
      Returns:
      true if the game is ended

    • isRoundEnded

      public boolean isRoundEnded()
      The game round is over as soon as: - a player gets rid of all his hand cards - the card deck is used up and a player would have to draw one or more cards NOTE: The current round will not be over, until the event has been executed completely.
      Returns:
      true, if round has finished

    • updateGameScore

      public void updateGameScore()
      Method to update points of every player

    • startTurn

      public void startTurn()
      starts a new Turn

    • switchToNextActivePlayer

      public void switchToNextActivePlayer()
      Method to set next Player as active player

    • markPlayableCards

      public void markPlayableCards()
      Method to mark playable cards on top of current card

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn()
      Method to end turn of current player

    • startRound

      public void startRound()
      1. deal initial number of cards to each player. 2. open top card. 3. set initial player 4. mark playable cards in his hand Note: - In the first round, the owner of the game is the dealer. - In the following rounds, the person who lost the last round – i.e. who scored the most points – becomes the dealer.

    • endRound

      public void endRound()
      Method to end round

    • evaluateLooserOfRound

      public void evaluateLooserOfRound()
      Method to evaluate Looser of the round

      Method to end the game

    • evaluateGameScore
